Meet ShibaNova

Degen Mode

Degens, feel free to ape in! (*Degen advice, not financial advice!)

Audits, Audits, Audits

We take security very seriously! We will allocate a significant portion of our funds on audits with the most prominent DeFi auditors before, during, and after we launch!

Shareholders

75% of all swap fees collected on our dApp goes back as dividends to all holders of our sNOVA tokens. Our Money Pot distributes dividends to our shareholders daily!

Tokens

Native-token

NOVA

LP Farming Reward Token

sNOVA

Farms & Pools
Rewards on NOVA farms will be sNOVA
Rewards for non-NOVA farms will be NOVA
Rewards for all pools will be NOVA
Fees Conversion
All fees will be converted into quote tokens.
Currently, only BNB & BUSD will be distribuited.

sNOVA

sNOVA can't be bought or sold like classic token
No need to do anything to stack sNOVA, holding it is enough.
The rewards come from two sources:
  • Deposit Fees
  • Swap Fees
Don't want to get any more rewards?
You can change your sNOVA for NOVA anytime.
1 sNOVA = 1 NOVA* read more
